message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Considering its exceptional value and quality, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This is an excellent chance to acquire a product worth $10000 to you at a reasonable premium, ensuring you maximize your investment while securing a deal that is beneficial for both parties. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
